name: Mushroom Pizza
description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. When still warm, the cheese becomes stretchy and gooey, making it extremely satisfying to eat.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Mushroom Pizza
suspicious.description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. If you can bite through the brick-like texture... At least it can ease your hunger.
suspicious.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.name: Delicious Mushroom Pizza
delicious.description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. It's a party in your mouth and the cheese and mushrooms invited all their delicious friends.
delicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

special.name: Invigorating Pizza
special.description: Jean's specialty. This pizza almost seems more art than food. Just one slice is enough to have you raring to go. Is this what keeps Jean working so hard?
special.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.
